episode.title: 侍と女
The Samurai and the Woman
Samouraï et Femme
Samurai to Onna
episode.summary: Gabimaru and Sagiri`s group cross paths with another Yamada Asaemon, Genji, who takes a dim view of Sagiri`s involvement in the present matter. Meanwhile, Yamada Asaemon Tenza tries to find a way off the island along with his charge, Nurugai. Source: Crunchyroll
